item.title: HUB3: Smagen af det asiatiske gadekøkken | Stegt gris vendt i sticky soja-brun farin-sesam-chilimarinade | Serveret i fløjlsbløde dampede bao boller fyldt med sprød kål, spicy kimchi og goma-dressing | | Stegt tofu vendt i sticky soja-brun farin-sesam-chilimarinade | Week 33 | Monday | Succulent chicken in a creamy peanut-curry sauce, filled with bell peppers, pak choy, potatoes and spring onions. Served with brown rice, salted peanuts and coriander for the brave. | Creamy peanut-curry sauce, filled with legumes, bell peppers, pak choy, potatoes and spring onions. Served with brown rice, salted peanuts and coriander for the brave. | Tuesday | Braised beef inspired by the Mediterranean coast. | Beef shoulder braised in white wine, tomatoes, olives, rosemary and aromatic herbs. | Served with spicy oven-roasted potatoes with lemon and oregano. | Mediterranean-inspired stew filled with eggplant and chickpeas | braised in white wine, tomatoes, olives, rosemary and other strong aromatic herbs. | Wednesday | Whole grain pasta with red pesto, made with sun-ripened tomatoes, red peppers, parmesan and almonds. Served with roasted portobello mushrooms, walnut crumble, parmesan and aromatic sage. | Cake of the day | Blackcurrant cake flavored with tonka bean and whipped cream fraice | Thursday | Delicious Danish fried chicken thighs, baked potatoes, green salad and fresh creme fraiche dressing filled with chopped herbs | Crispy fried halloumi and baked mushrooms, served with hazelnut baked potatoes, green salad and fresh creme fraiche dressing filled with chopped herbs | Friday | The taste of Asian street cuisine | Roasted pork in sticky soy-brown sugar-sesame-chili marinade | Served in velvety soft steamed bao buns filled with crispy cabbage, spicy kimchi and goma dressing | Fried tofu in sticky soy-brown sugar-sesame-chili marinade | Vegetar | Vegetarian
